description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a6208","text":"This a protocol to make vitamins for algal chemostats that are used to feed Daphnia and Ceriodaphnia in the Duffy Lab. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
document: {"blocks":[{"key":"c6a0r","text":"VITAMINS – CONTENTS","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3uf76","text":"       VITAMIN      mg/2L      Sigma Cat#      Classification        1. Biotin      10      B4501               2.   Thiamine      200      T4625               3.   Pyridoxine      200      P9755               4.   Pyridoxamine      6      P9380               5. Calcium   pantothenate      500      P2250               6. B 12      2      V2876               7.   Nicotinic Acid      100      N4126               8.   Nicotinamide      100      N3376               9. Folic   Acid      40      F7876               10.   Riboflavin      60      R4500               11.   Inositol      180      I5125          ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":609}],"data":{}},{"key":"a9t56","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6srbl","text":"Since algae do not supply all the requirements for zooplankton culture, a mixture of eleven vitamins is added to the algal culture while it is in exponential growth phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acduu","text":"To make the mixture, compounds are weighed on the analytical balance and combined in 2L volumetric flask containing approximately 1800 ml of MilliQ water. Cover the flask with aluminum foil or a box and allow to mix on a stir plate until the vitamins have dissolved into a clear yellow color. Fill to 2L with MilliQ water. A minimum volume of 2L is used in order to have a weighable amount of pyridoxamine and B 12.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ggt9","text":"The solution is then dispensed into dated 6 oz. Whirl paks and frozen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eq9o2","text":"As needed, vitamins are thawed and poured into sterile, microcentrifuge tubes. The tubes are then refrozen and stored in the dark since vitamins are sensitive to light and heat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9pku","text":"The mixture can kept frozen for more than a year and at 4-6 C for several weeks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i31q","text":"1-2 ml of vitamin mixture is normally added for each liter of media solution. Vitamins are added to the algae by withdrawing the desired amount using a syringe and injecting it into the silicone tubing while adding media to the algal culture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk9s8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3r917","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24f71","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pbbg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70rom","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7c1ra","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lqig","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftgg1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","10_0":"","10_1":"","10_2":"","10_3":"","11_0":"","11_1":"","11_2":"","11_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","4_3":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","5_3":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","6_2":"","6_3":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","7_2":"","7_3":"","8_0":"","8_1":"","8_2":"","8_3":"","9_0":"","9_1":"","9_2":"","9_3":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["175",70,124],"data":[["  \u0026nbsp; VITAMIN  ","  mg/2L  ","  Sigma Cat#  "],["  1. title: Vitamins for Algal Chemostats
